from math import factorial
for t in range(input()):
	a=list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
	#the code	
	k=input()
	a.sort(reverse=True)
	sum=0
	q=0
	r=0
	
	for i in range(k):
		sum+=a[i]
		if a[i]==a[k-1]:
			r+=1
	for i in range(k,len(a)):
		if a[i]==a[k-1]:
			q+=1
	n=q+r
	print factorial(n)/factorial(r)/factorial(n-r)
